page.title: 13WARESIDE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: This is a solid construction containing a solid wooden dance area big enough to accommodate one hundred dancers.There is a kitchen,bar and ladies powder room. It is good having the hall because there are discos which we children can go to and also a Youth Club for all ages.We pay 25p each week. The local drama group called the Wareside Entertainers put on all their shows in the hall.They have really funny pantomimes at Christmas and two or three productionsduring the year. They transform the hall with tiered seating,brilliant lights and scenery. The hall can be hired for wedding receptions,birthday parties, christenings,fund raising bazaars and dances.The Church Harvest Supper always takes place during the Autumn.
